participant_1.background:
I used to be more spontaneous with my painting.
I can swim if I have to, but I prefer to save my energy for my vintage cars.
i have six siblings.
I want to show off my new earrings to my friends.
i am witty.

participant_2.background:
My most valuable possession is the memories I've made gardening with my dad.
I work and live with my wife, and we love chai tea.
I like to laugh and help animals in my free time.
i have never been to the west coast of the united states.
I like to keep my home clean and tidy, but I also have a wild side and enjoy trying new things like auditioning for a talent show.

content.text: Hi there! Not much, just relaxing and enjoying a cup of chai.
That sounds nice! I really like chai tea.
Me too! What are some of your hobbies?
I like to paint, swim, and spend time with my friends and family.
That's great! I love to paint too. What kind of paintings do you like to do?
I like to do abstract paintings. They're really fun and creative.
That sounds cool! I'm more of a traditional artist. I like to paint landscapes and portraits.
Those are both great genres! I love seeing the different ways people interpret the world through their paintings.
Me too! It's so interesting to see how different people see things.
I think it's a great way to express yourself.
I agree! It's a really therapeutic way to let out your emotions.
Yeah, it really is. I'm glad you enjoy painting!
Thanks! I'm glad you do too
